entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Text.Json Serializer Behavior Changes Depending on Object Interfaces #64302
  • RegexReductionTests are failing in browser #64300
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed '((node->OperGet() == GT_CALL) && (def->OperIsStore() || def->OperIs(GT_PUTARG_STK, GT_NOP, GT_ARGPLACE))) || ((node->OperGet() == GT_JTRUE) && (def->TypeGet() == TYP_VOID) && ((def->gtFlags & GTF_SET_FLAGS) != 0))' during 'Rationalize IR' #64297
    7.0.0
  • Double.ToString(format) not throwing FormatException #64295
  • HostBuilder.CreateServiceProvider() on release 6.0 generates System.ArgumentNullException #64293
  • Invalid format specifier on DateOnly in string interpolation leads to infinite loop instead of FormatException #64292
  • R2RDump crashes when disassembling composite framework due to duplicate key in PGO method map #64291
    7.0.0
  • Identify places where file handles are closed and very soon reopened again #64288
    7.0.0
  • ASP.NET service Segmentation fault in Docker container with .NET 6.0 #64282
  • How do I embed an Info.plist / add arbitrary linker args? #64276
  • [API Proposal]: MemoryExtensions.SequenceEqualUntil<T> #64271
    7.0.0
  • Getting command line via Diagnostic IPC APIs doesn't work properly in .NET 6 #64270
  • <MonoAOTCompiler/> fails on F# projects due to satellite assemblies #64269
    6.0.MAUI
  • Investigate using Auto layout for structs in the framework #64261
  • Nuget packages not properly restored when ReadyToRun publishing #64260
  • [Perf] Changes at 1/21/2022 9:08:44 PM #64275
  • [Perf] Changes at 1/21/2022 9:08:44 PM #64273
    7.0.0
  • .NET Core app - submission to Mac app store #64258
  • Duplicate assembly macros #64253
  • Bug of Uri #64249
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: RequiredMemberAttribute and NoRequiredMembersAttribute #64248
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\CLR-x86-JIT\\V1-M09.5-PDC\\b27657\\b27657\\b27657.cmd #64246
    7.0.0
  • NativeAOT codegen optimization opportunities #64242
    Future

Closed

  • Audit resource string formatting where excess arguments are passed #63607
    7.0.0
  • Switch to primarily using a managed parser for AssemblyName #45032
    7.0.0
  • Consider using Mono.Posix in test code instead of directly P/Invoking to libc #63811
  • Error in CI `Mono llvmfullaot Pri0 Runtime Tests Run Linux arm64 release` #60234
  • Add CancellationToken to StreamReader.Read* methods #20824
    7.0.0
  • API Proposal: Add `ref` field feature support to `RuntimeFeature` class #64165
    7.0.0
  • Improve vectorization of MemoryExtensions.IndexOf(..., span) #60866
    7.0.0
  • ILVerify false error with array covariance and type parameter #63999
    7.0.0
  • system.io.filesystemaclextensionstests failing regularly on Mono #64280
  • PlatformNotSupportedException FileInfo_ReadRights_WithSecurity FileInfo_WriteRights_WithSecurity #64221
  • Add Time value type in System #25816
    Future
  • DOTNET_ROOT does not work as the doc says. #64244
  • `object.GetType` needs to have an exception set #63553
    7.0.0
  • Investigate benefit of computing max regex match length #62697
    7.0.0
  • Performance degradation when using property-init over constructor on record-struct #64257
  • Maybe a bug in Uri class #64245
    7.0.0
  • MemoryMappedFile.CreateNew on macOS throws System.IO.PathTooLongException #63240
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono] Always store to allocas in OP_LLVM_OUTARG_VT #64303
    runtime-mono, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Override all `Read` methods in `NullTextReader` and `NullStreamReader` #64301
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Fix minor typos in GC documentation. #64298
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix arm64/PInvoke so that NESTED_ENTRY/NESTED_END labels match. #64296
    community-contribution
  • [mono] Allow missing assemblies in llvmonly+interp mode. #64294
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [mono] Avoid inlining the wrappers used by CALLI. #64290
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add attributes for required members #64287
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • Update the managed type system to more gracefully fail when calling a varargs method. #64286
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Cancel pending ReadableStream on Dispose #64285
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix profiling objectsallocatedbyclass (#63814) #64284
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.3
  • WIP: CoreCLR runtime tests on Mono Windows x64. #64281
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Move DllImportGenerator to use DisableRuntimeMarshalling for its blittable classification #64279
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [mono] Recognize new names for Xamarin.iOS etc assemblies #64278
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Codespaces] Make it possible to run wasm samples in the browser #64277
    area-Infrastructure
  • Implement TLS1.3 delayed client cert requests on Linux #64268
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • [release/6.0] Make sure that shared memory object name meets the length requiremens #64266
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 6.0.3
  • FileSystem.Unix: CopyFile: use copy_file_range on Linux. #64264
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix exception propagation over HW exception frame on macOS arm64 #64262
    Servicing-approved, arch-arm64, os-mac-os-x, area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.3
  • make sure failed SSL does not impact other sessions #64256
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • Support {Last}IndexOfAny with sets after {lazy} loops #64254
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] make sure OpenSSL is initialized before Tls13Supported code runs #64252
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.3
  • Simplify the creation of diagnostics using DiagnosticId #64250
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix generic method resolution in composite R2R images #64247
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • When decommitting, leaving one instead of two pages in regions case. #64243
    area-GC-coreclr

Merged

  • Add Regex.Count string overloads #64289
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Fix formatting of resource string where excess arguments are passed #63824
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Improve Regex handling of anchors #64177
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Moved AssemblyName helpers to managed #62866
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Faster IndexOf for substrings #63285
    area-System.Memory
  • Add CancellationToken to TextReader.ReadXAsync #61898
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Restrict parallelism in LLVM FullAOT compile, to prevent OOM #63800
    area-Build-mono
  • Catch UnicodeEncodeErrors during printing superpmi logs #64251
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-preview1] Ensure that we aren't accidentally generating instructions for unsupported ISAs #64224
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add ref field runtime feature indication #64167
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 7.0.0
  • Only send to Helix for rolling build, due to small Helix queue #64274
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Take ARMv6 out of PlatformGroup All #64267
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Correct JsonNode.Root doc #64238
    documentation, area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Skip tests using AsyncIO in FileSystemAclExtensionsTests where it's not supported #64212
    area-System.IO
  • Use lower call count threshold for tiering in debug builds #60945
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add the exception set for `ObjGetType` #64106
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [ILVerify] Fix casting check for arrays of generic parameters with class constraints #64259
    area-ILVerification
  • Delete unused ApiCompat baseline files #64190
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-maui' #64056
    area-codeflow
  • Fix PAL_wprintf for wide characters #64181
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Make XmlSerializer.Generator targets incremental #64191
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Make sure that shared memory object name meets the length requirements #64099
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Update main branding to preview2 #64219
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Avoid deadlock with ConfigurationManager #63816
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 6.0.3
  • BackgroundService doc: improve API documentation #63011
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Add UnreachableException #63922
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Clone ADDR(LCL) for DUP #64171
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove usage of FEATURE_CORESYSTEM #63850
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Morph `Vector.Create(0)` to `Vector.Zero` #63821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix ReadyToRun loading on Apple Silicon (.NET 6) #64104
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Reverse `ASG(CLS_VAR, ...)` #63957
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • add osr plus stress tests for libraries #64116
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: simple forward substitution pass #63720
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • More cleanups in assembly loader area #63157
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Avoid an assert in ves_icall_RuntimeFieldInfo_SetValueInternal #64214
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Preserve existing keys in dictionary #63834
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure
  • Trying to fix issue #63788: "NetworkChange.NetworkAddressChanged event leaks threads on Linux #63963
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Use generic collections in System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter implementation #63315
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • #51371 fixed failing test in iossimulator #63877
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Check for CMAKE_C_COMPILER_ID not CXX #64226
  • Allow StoreLclVar src to be IND/FLD. #59315
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix unique VNs for `ADDR`s #64230
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Commutative morph optimizations #64122
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Improve `fgValueNumberBlockAssignment` #64110
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Stop using `CLS_VAR` for "boxed statics" #63845
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Remove ternary workaround for string.IsNullOrEmpty #63095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] JIT/EE interface for getting ABI-info #62893
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Add optimization "X & 1 == 1" to "X & 1" (#61412) #62818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Allow symbols 3 external symbols into the gcc/gcov library. #64236
    community-contribution
  • Change exception throw when ICustomMarshaller applied to field #64183
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Update zip extraction to never throw any exceptions when the LastWriteTime update fails #64192
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Compression, 6.0.3
  • Throw during renegotiation if there is incomplete received TLS frame #64066
    area-System.Net.Security
  • gcc compilations for ARM64 can not initialize extern "C" variables. #64239
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Check for CodeSizeZero error before any assumptions about code existing #63239
    area-ILVerification, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix crash when VS4Mac is debugging VS4Mac arm64 #64086
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.3
  • Use stable outputs in illink targets #64160
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Fix IsMutuallyAuthenticated on Linux and OSX #63945
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement support to Set Next Instruction Pointer. #64114
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Support chrome debugging using chrome://inspect #63900
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [API Implementation]: Support for Intel SHA extensions #62999
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix DNS cancellation deadlock #63904
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • Improve String.Substring performance #62577
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Allow SslStream in ConnectCallback #63851
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Unify reading from procfs to get network related information #63696
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • Ensure that canceled Task.Delays invoke continuations asynchronously from Cancel #64217
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, tenet-reliability, 7.0.0
  • fix ping with SendIpHeader on FreeBSD #63531
    area-System.Net, os-freebsd
  • Expand System.Runtime.InteropServices.NFloat to support the APIs required by Xamarin #64234
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Refactor FileStatus.Unix. #62721
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Serialize SendPacketsAsync tests #63888
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Including FastFloat in parsing process #62301
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Avoid name collision for covariant and hidden properties (#63443) #63823
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Remove usage of codecvt from corerun #64157
    area-Host, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Group 2] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Options` #63767
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Initial templates implementation #63683
  • Build ILCompiler NuGet packages #63212
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [wasm][debugger] Don't show the wasm functions on callstack when debugging managed code #64223
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Reduce the size of HeaderDescriptor #64105
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Fix race conditions in SystemEvents shutdown logic #62773
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • Fix several bugs in NullabilityInfoContext. #64143
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Inject RegexGeneratorAttribute from the generator #64229
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • issue-22928 Add ImmutableArray Span-based APIs #61196
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Console.Unix: fix missing terminal configuration on SIGINT/SIGQUIT/SGCONT. #64200
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • Moved AssemblyName helpers to managed (part 2) #63915
    area-System.Reflection
  • 62606 Return fully qualified path from FileSystemEventArgs #63051
    area-System.IO, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Move libunwind directories to src/native/external #64043
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Optimize generic sharing for generic methods. #64129
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add gen folder moving gen projects from src folder #64231
    area-Extensions-Logging

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Native AOT]: how to make ILC not to append these libs #1832

Closed

  • NativeAOT: dwarfdump --verify produces thousands of warnings and errors #1535

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • installation rollback - dotnet workload install android #23573
    Discussion
  • The user as nt authority is fail to upgrade to 6.0.102 with 17.0.5 pre-installed #23567
    6.0.2xx

Closed

  • .NET SDK 5.0.402 to .NET SDK 5.0.403 compilation failure with CA1416: Validate platform compatibility #22546
  • Adjust sdk with global using #19021
  • Naming of the properties that control implicit namespaces included by the SDK #18839
  • How to deploy a Windows Service in VS2019 #23537
  • Inconsistent error code for NETSDK1174 #22639
    6.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow pdb deltas to be applied to Blazor WASM app #23581
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Switch to 1ES pools for publishing #23575
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • `dotnet watch` test fix search console history #23521
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.3xx] Backport Improve console output of `dotnet watch` ⌚ (#23318) #23400
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-Watch, 6.0.3xx
  • Better caching for RazorSourceGenerator when SuppressRazorSourceGener… #23419
    Area-AspNetCore, 6.0.3xx

Updated

  • Allow print rollback when non-admin. #23326
    Area-Workloads, 6.0.3xx
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1570951 #23536
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #23532
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Build Single-File for Windows 7 #23177
    Area-External, Area-SingleFile
  • [release/6.0.x] Build Single-File for Windows 7 #23336
    Area-ILLink

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-25
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Lightweight documentation comment syntax #2394
  • [Proposal] Required Properties #3630
    Working Set
  • Champion: Simplified parameter null validation code #2145
    Working Set
  • [API proposal] Attribute for passing caller identity implicitly #4984
    Needs More Work
  • [Proposal]: Attributes on Main for top level programs #5045
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: nested members in `with` and object creation #4587
    Needs More Work

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • C# LSP light bulbs don't indicate which Diagnostics they fix properly #59067
  • VB IDE0058 change to Call or make unused a keyword #59063
  • Remove Cannot_navigate_to_the_symbol_under_the_caret from EditorFeaturesResources #59061
  • Decompiled enums without `[Flags]` could have their values displayed in hex form #59056
  • Add analyzer tests for more syntax node types #59054
  • IntelliSense and syntax highlight not working at all for function pointer callconv-s #59052
    Backlog
  • Compiler generate buggy code when using exception filter with pattern matching #59050

Closed

  • `SemanticModel.GetSymbolInfo` doesn't return a symbol for `FunctionPointerUnmanagedCallingConventionSyntax` #59060
  • VS completely crashes upon writing a faulty Attribute #59003
  • Parameter null-checking public API #58307
  • Duplicate syntax node callbacks for top-level statements #58561
    17.2
  • Type confusion and OOB memory access in positional record structs #59010
  • SyntaxNodeAction is invoked twice for the same syntax node in case of positional records #53136
    17.1
  • Bug in DiagnosticAnalysisContextHelpers.VerifyDiagnosticLocationsInCompilation #46728
    Backlog
  • API proposal: Compilation.GetDeterministicKey #57162
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Function pointer calling convention IDE support #59062
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove dependency on EditorFeatures from Remote.ServiceHub project #59059
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • [17.0] Report error if 'record struct' constructor calls default parameterless constructor #59055
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Do not hardcode position at which named arguments are starting for well-known attributes. #59048
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Address param-nullchecking public API design review #58987
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add explicit exit to merge-vs-deps script #59066
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Avoid duplicate syntax node callbacks for CompilationUnitSyntax nodes… #59051
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main #59057
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Use existing `previousSpan` variable. #59053
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Fix "merge main-vs-deps" task in official build #59058
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Update source-generators.cookbook.md #58713
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1566533 #58926
    auto-merge
  • Support `u8` type suffix for UTF8 string literals. #58991
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Fix documentation bug on SyntaxFactory.VerbatimIdentifier #59004
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main #58934
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Avoid duplicate syntax node callbacks for record declarations #58482
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Next
  • Verify correct additional location for reported diagnostic #58630
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add docs/compilers and docs/ide to CODEOWNERS #58993
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, Next
  • API for getting a deterministic key for a Compilation #57134
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #59049
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #59068
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Json parsing #42864
    Area-IDE, Need Design Review
  • IDE response to raw string literals #58846
    Area-IDE
  • EditorConfig UI help link #54623
    Area-IDE
  • AsyncIterator: clear Current upon exit #58949
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Async Streams
  • [semi-auto-props]: Refactor and rename 'AccessingAutoPropertyFromConstructor' #58832
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • SignatureHelp: guess best overload for incomplete invocations #31843
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Backlog
  • Apply source-build patches #58727
    Area-Infrastructure
  • List patterns: Recreate the decision dag for lowering #59019
    Area-Compilers
  • Filter cancellation exceptions in generator driver #58843
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.2
  • Add additional test for raw interpolated strings. #59041
    Area-Compilers
  • Json features #59034
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Json parsing with tests. #42873
    Area-IDE
  • Correctly handle additional inputs to user-defined conversions #58730
    Area-Compilers
  • Compiler warning CS8600 message: say possibly null-valued expression #58860
    Area-Compilers
  • Avoid race condition in map for TupleElementIndex #58500
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Tuples
  • WRN_ConvertingNullableToNonNullable: fix literal #59016
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Razor snippets #58857
    Area-IDE
  • Clarify semi-required properties #59047
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .Net 6, Minimal API - Endpoint does not appear in swagger-output if Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http parameter exists in "MapXXX" #39766
  • Use vdir environment variable when injecting browser refresh script #39762
  • Security schemes cannot be generated for individual endpoints/actions #39761
    7.0-preview2
  • Test failure - "DefaultReconnectionHandler.test - invokes update on each attempt" #39758
  • Inferring `FromServices` optionality based on nullability information #39757
    7.0-preview2
  • Telemetry for EnableInsecureAbsoluteFormHostOverride #39756
    6.0.x
  • Inferring `FromBody.AllowEmptyBehavior = Allow` based nullability information #39754
    7.0-preview2
  • Ability to use DiagnosticSource in Kestrel without the rest of ASP.NET Core #39744
  • Blazor server renders twice resulting in static HTML animation showing twice #39740
    Backlog

Closed

  • OpenAPI analyzers for Problem Details #39750
  • Nested TagHelpers that share HTML names can cause the SyntaxTree to be of incorrect length #39764
  • [SignalR] retryContext in withAutomaticReconnect to expose more http context #37439
    .NET 7 Planning
  • SignalR C# Client StartAsync() CancellationToken not respected #39626
    7.0-preview2
  • ApiExplorer not handling multiple routes on same action method correctly #26234
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Automatic type inference won't work when an EventCallBack<T> is added #39734
  • [Component Vulnerability]please consider to upgrade node-fetch in @microsoft/signalr from @^2.x.x to @^3.1.1 #39672
    7.0-preview2
  • Compiler crashing issues reported through internal telemetry #38878
  • Generic Blazor component can't correctly infer it's type when type has an additional constraint #25588
    7.0-preview2
  • [Blazor] CascadingTypeParameter problem #38479
    7.0-preview2
  • partial tag helper content not rendered in asp.net core 6 hosted in IIS 10 #38541
    Discussions
  • [Consumes] and CORS together doesn't work without a spooky workaround #4887
    .NET 7 Planning
  • SDK Blazor Hot Reload Test Failure `Run_WithHotReloadEnabled_ReadsLaunchSettings_WhenUsingProjectOption` #39657
    7.0-preview1
  • Can't get SignalR to work behind AWS ALB #39736

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove Web.JS Jest Tests #39763
    area-blazor
  • Fix: HttpMethodMatcherPolicy.ApplyAsync ArgumentNullException #39759
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add readonly to record struct #39755
    area-runtime
  • define RouteValuesAddress .ToString () #39753
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Bump node-fetch from 2.6.5 to 2.6.7 in /src/Components/Web.JS #39751
    area-blazor, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • Use IndexOfAny(char, char) with Span #39743
    area-mvc, area-blazor, feature-routing, community-contribution
  • Allow pdb delta to be optionally included in a hot reload payload #39742
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 6.0.3

Merged

  • Move some targets into a Directory.Build.targets file #39712
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • .ConfigureAwait(false) in SignalR client libraries #39728
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview2
  • Removing from API Description parameters when inferred (FromPath) and not in the route #39607
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • Update node-fetch to 2.6.7 #39741
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview1
  • Refactor (Web.JS) : Follow up fixes #39748
    area-blazor, auto-merge, community-contribution
  • Added more stream result types #39709
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Bump log4js from 6.3.0 to 6.4.0 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/FunctionalTests #39686
    area-signalr, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • [release/5.0] Improve File access issues #39732
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • [Backport] Fix browser cookie tests to only run with HTTPS #39680
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Don't reference test asset projects in Build.props #39733
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Add dark mode for developer exception page #39676
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Do not assume that `this._settings.loginMode` is not `undefined`. #35245
    area-blazor
  • Declare readonly members for mutable structs #39637
    area-runtime
  • Add support for DI in Hub methods #34047
    area-signalr
  • [release/6.0] Use 1ES machines for official builds #39683
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Always build App.Ref and the targeting packs #39620
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 6.0.3

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update arcade dependency for Preview 11 release branch and rebuild / release 6.0.1xx workloads / packs #4319
  • [Shell] Application crashes Page constructor arg cannot resolve type from service provider (wrong constructor used) #4318
  • Add nuget API diffs to CI pipeline #4316
  • Preview 12 and VS 2022 for Mac #4313
  • Binding Command on ImageButton not working #4312
  • Crush after navigating from one page (with navbar) to another one without navbar #4311
  • The App using Shell always have App Name as default title. #4310
  • [Android] AppShell navigation - Table View - Java.Lang.IllegalStateException #4307
  • Crash during navigation with Navigation page #4306
  • Define a default namespace for .NET MAUI Blazor controls similar to that of Community Toolkit #4303
  • AmbigousMatchException throwing when a control that inherent from Element is instantiated #4300
  • Enable VS 2022 "External Sources", Source Link, and/or Source Server #4299

Closed

  • [Android] Wrong default colors in Switch #4085
  • [Shell] On windows there is no Titlebar #4267
  • Unable to deploy maui apps to android devices #4317
  • Unable to build maui apps #4309
  • [Enhancement][hotreload][P0] Add an overlay layer on Application, for In-App Selection Mode support #572
    6.0.200-preview.13
  • Build fails with `Xamarin.Android.D8.targets(79,5): MSB6006 "java.exe" exited with code 1` #3965
  • Is VS 2022 Preview and MAUI in a functional condition? #4277
  • Unable to build any maui apps #4294

PullRequests

Created

  • Modify existing rectangle rather than creating a new one #4321
  • Introduce IPlatformApplication #4320
    partner/ui-tools
  • Fix compiler errors #4301

Merged

  • Update IOSWebViewManager.cs #4158
    area/blazor 🕸️, platform/iOS 🍎, s/needs info ❓
  • [Housekeeping] Add pending Core interface comments #4289
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Implement CanGoBack and CanGoForward properties in WebViewHandlers #4288
    partner/webview2, area/controls 🎮
  • [Android] Fix Switch color issues #4134
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #4298
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Account for spacing when determining available space for star rows/columns #3871
    area/layout 🔲, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • [iOS, Android, Windows] Implement Border properties in ImageButton #3641
    area/controls 🎮
  • [ci] Target the Mac internal-macOS-11 hosted agent pool #4241
  • Make Essentials lifecycle registration happen by default #4221
  • [Core] Implement BackgroundImageSource in PageHandler #3396
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Core] Implement IsReadOnly property in SearchBar #3391
    area/controls 🎮
  • Implement RefreshViewHandler on Windows #3299
    area/controls 🎮
  • Implement touch events in GraphicsView #3261
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/drawing ✏️
  • [iOS] Update DatePickerHandler and TimePickerHandler #3761
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • [Catalyst] Fix OnPlatform on macOS #3763
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/Xaml </>, do-not-merge
  • [Windows] Fix issue not rendering ProgressBar control #4191
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟
  • [Windows] CarouselViewHandler #4200
    platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • [Android] Changes to reduce unnecessary layout requests #4229
    area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, partner
  • Implement Eval method in WebViewHandlers #4284
    partner/webview2, area/controls 🎮

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EFCore fails to filter when projecting to a C# record type #27281
  • Scaffold-DbContext doesn't produce AspNetUserRoles Class and DbSet #27279
  • Test Aggregate_over_subquery_in_group_by_projection is non-deterministic #27278
  • InvalidOperationException with HasPeriodStart and InMemoryDatabase #27277
  • .NET6 - `null` "provider" after `AddSingleton<IMethodCallTranslatorPlugin, ...>()` #27276
  • Is there a way to create a migration by comparing the current ContextModelSnapshot to a live DB? #27275
  • EntityFramework with CosmosDB bug: Nested embedded entities get rearranged on deletion #27272

Closed

  • OR clause allowing NULL is generated when joining on NullableProperty.Value #27071
  • Repeated typo in PropertyAccessMode Enum documentation #26923
    7.0.0
  • Nullable foreign key property deletes self entity from the database when set to null #27260
  • Make SQL connection string readonly at runtime #27256
  • EF Core 6 - Sql server int to BIT mapping not allowed #27240
  • Nullability in TrackGraph signature #27257
    7.0.0
  • Is possible to get the Global Filter attached to specific Entity? #27207
  • EF 5.X net5.0 target gone from Nuget #27273
  • Migrations - InsertData silently truncates long strings that contain newlines due to improper `CONCAT` usage. #27271

PullRequests

Created

  • Start flowing Microsoft.Data.SqlClient again #27282
  • Fix non-deterministic tests that fail on postgres #27280
    auto-merge
  • Fix to #27229 - Test: Convert query tests to conditional theory #27274

Merged

  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw to 2.0.8-pre20220111224339 #27191
    auto-merge
  • Remove quirks #27258
  • Fix typos in PropertyAccessMode #27248
  • Correct TrackGraph nullability #27261
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Fix ValueGenerated On Add Or Update, , make ValueGeneratedOnUpdate() and ValueGeneratedOnAddOrUpdate() working #26713
  • Change timer from method variable to property of SqlConnectioninteral #26495
    waiting-for-response
  • Case sensitive parameters 18861 #26287
    waiting-for-response
  • Add Migration name check #26396
    waiting-for-response
  • Add <inheritdoc /> in migrations #27268
  • [release/6.0] RevEng: Don't use nameof syntax (#26622) #27231
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] Update build and test machines #27238
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
